scripts.dev: turbo run build:packages && turbo run dev
scripts.dev:watchers: pnpm run dev:redis:up && pnpm run build:packages && turbo run dev --filter=@wiretap/token-created-watcher --filter=@wiretap/swap-watcher --filter=@wiretap/vitest-config --filter=@wiretap/config --filter=@wiretap/utils --filter=@wiretap/db --filter=@wiretap/redis
scripts.dev:swap-watcher: pnpm run dev:redis:up && pnpm run build:packages && turbo run dev --filter=@wiretap/swap-watcher --filter=@wiretap/vitest-config --filter=@wiretap/config --filter=@wiretap/utils --filter=@wiretap/db --filter=@wiretap/redis
scripts.dev:token-created-watcher: pnpm run dev:redis:up && pnpm run build:packages && turbo run dev --filter=@wiretap/token-created-watcher --filter=@wiretap/vitest-config --filter=@wiretap/config --filter=@wiretap/utils --filter=@wiretap/db --filter=@wiretap/redis
scripts.dev:block-receiver-server: pnpm run build:packages && turbo run dev --filter=@wiretap/block-receiver-server --filter=@wiretap/vitest-config --filter=@wiretap/config --filter=@wiretap/utils --filter=@wiretap/db --filter=@wiretap/redis
scripts.dev:webapp: pnpm run build:packages && turbo run dev --filter=@wiretap/webapp --filter=@wiretap/config --filter=@wiretap/utils --filter=@wiretap/db
scripts.test: pnpm run test-db:start && pnpm run test-db:migration && turbo run test ; pnpm run test-db:stop
scripts.test:watch:watchers: pnpm run test-db:start && pnpm run test-db:migration && turbo run test:watch --ui=tui --filter=@wiretap/token-created-watcher; pnpm run test-db:stop
scripts.test:watch:db: pnpm run test-db:start && pnpm run test-db:migration && turbo run test:watch --ui=tui --filter=@wiretap/db; pnpm run test-db:stop
